attributes.action: No room at the Inn - Say no to asylum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please visit The Border Agency website & look at the statistics for immigrants & asylum seekers who enter the UK each year.  They are taking British jobs & British homes. In turn they are taking our land as we need to build new homes to accommodate.  Some are even taking our tax payers money in benefits whilst British citizens are struggling!  Let's say no!
